net.tmachine.gpg.hue
Class BaseHUD

java.lang.Object
  net.tmachine.gpg.hue.BaseHUD
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, HUD, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShapeCreator, ShapeRenderer, ShapeShifter, ShapeShifter2
public abstract class BaseHUD
extends java.lang.Object
implements HUD

Provides most of the common methods etc for HUD implementations Subclasses should set the "name" variable in their constructor.
